title: The Last Song
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
This is the sound
The here and the now
You got to talk, to talk, to talk, to talk
To get it all out
[Pre-Chorus 1]
I listen
I listen
I listen
But you're out of tune
You're so out of tune
[Chorus]
This is the last song (This is the last song)
This is the last song
That I will dedicate to you
[Verse 2]
Something I've found
Yeah, while I'm still around
You got to walk, to walk, to walk, to walk
To make any ground
[Pre-Chorus 2]
You're pushin'
You're pushin'
You're pushin'
But there ain't no room
No, there ain't no room!

[Chorus]
This is the last song (This is the last song)
This is the last song (This is the last song)
That I will dedicate to you
Made my peace and now I'm through
This is the last song
That I will dedicate to you
[Bridge]
And yours is a name
I will never name again, I will never name again
We pretend it doesn't matter
We pretend it all away, we pretend it all away
[Pre-Chorus 3]
We pretend
We pretend
We pretend
But it ain't no use!
[Chorus]
This is the last song (This is the last song)
This is the last song (This is the last song)
That I will dedicate to you
Made my peace and now I'm through
This is the last song
That I will dedicate to you

[Outro]
To you
To you
